# 设置 hosts

* 编辑 hosts 文件： `vim /etc/hosts`
* 编辑 hosts 文件： `C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc\hosts`

```text

# develop env
127.0.0.1 testing-service-hostname
127.0.0.1 my-service
127.0.0.1 my-consul
127.0.0.1 my-etcd
127.0.0.1 my-jaeger
127.0.0.1 my-mysql
127.0.0.1 my-postgres
127.0.0.1 my-rabbitmq
127.0.0.1 my-redis
127.0.0.1 my-mongo
127.0.0.1 my-mongo1
127.0.0.1 my-mongo2
127.0.0.1 my-mongo3

```
